ValidationRule.description: When a proprietary opp is moved to Closed/Won, the Moderator field must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', RecordType.Name = 'Proprietary', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISBLANK( Moderator_Consultant__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Moderator field before moving to Closed Won.
